description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nDarkbloom:
This creature's base stats are 20, plus 5 for each permanent Spell Gem it has equipped. The base stat that is increased by this trait is determined by the class of the Spell Gem. Only the first 8 Spell Gems are considered.
name: Particle of Akara
